#summary Description of what MacFusion can do, as of today.
#labels Features,Featured

  * Menubar interface for quick mounting filesystems or mount favorites
  * Storing of saved favorites
  * Auto-mounting of selected favorites when MacFusion is started
  * Notification of errors or other messages using Growl
  * SSH FS
    * Password Authentication using Google's askpass program, storage of passwords in keychain
    * Key-based authentication integrates with an agent app, like SSHKeyChain
